object.name: gloves combat
object.short_descr: a pair of minotaur combat gloves
object.description: A pair of metal plated gloves lie here.

extra_description.description:
These gloves are plated with metal plates that provide strength and 
protection.

object.name: spiked armor garde
object.short_descr: a suit of spiked garde armor
object.description: A pile of spiked chainmail lies here.

object.name: greaves black
object.short_descr: a pair of black minotaur greaves
object.description: Some black metal greaves lie here.

object.name: vambraces black
object.short_descr: a pair of black minotaur vambraces
object.description: Some black metal vambraces lie here.

object.name: rod weaponry
object.description: A shiny metal rod lies here.

object.name: cloak pitch black
object.description: A pile of black cloth lies here.

extra_description.description: It appears to have pockets inside it.

object.name: neckguard neck guard black plate
object.description: A black plate collar rests here.

object.name: spiked gauntlets
object.description: A pair of spiked gauntlets lies here.

extra_description.description: They look pretty damaging.

object.name: shield shadow
object.description: A shadowy shield rests here.

extra_description.description: You look into the depths of the shield and shiver at the evil it contains.

object.name: nightbringer short sword shortsword
object.description: A very evil looking shortsword lies here.

extra_description.description: The runes "NiGHtBrINgeR" are scrawled along the blade.

object.name: visor helm golden
object.description: A helm and visor made of pure gold rests here.

object.name: breast plate gilded gold
object.description: A large golden breast plate lies here.

object.name: cape white billowing silk
object.description: A pile of white silk lies here.

object.name: shield huge tower
object.description: A huge shield lies here.

extra_description.description: A pure white shield with a gold cross emblazoned across it.

object.name: dawnbringer mace huge two-handed
object.description: A huge mace lies here. It radiates an aura of power.

extra_description.description: The runes "DAwNbRIngER" are scrawled along the handle.

object.name: spectacles wire rimmed
object.short_descr: a pair of wire rimmed spectacles
object.description: A small pair of wire rimmed spectacles rests here.

extra_description.description: They'll make you look smart.

object.name: ring banded
object.description: A small ring made of gold and silver bands lies here.

extra_description.description: The ring has entwined bands of gold and silver.

object.name: globe minor
object.description: A small globe rests here. It shimmers and radiates power.

extra_description.description: Shimmering colors move inside the globe.

object.name: staff gnarled magius
object.description: A gnarled staff lies here.

extra_description.description: It appears to be simply a gnarled old limb. It feels powerful though.

object.name: girdle pouches many
object.description: A girdle lies here.

extra_description.description: It appears to be full of tiny pockets.

object.name: robe heavy woolen
object.description: A heavy pile of wool lies here.

object.name: brooch ivory
object.description: A small ivory brooch lies here.

object.name: manual arts healing book
object.description: A small book lies here.

extra_description.description: It appears to be a book of anatomy and medicine.

object.name: mace huge mithril
object.description: A huge mace made of mithril metal lies here.

object.name: symbol holy golden
object.description: A small holy symbol on a golden chain lies here.

object.name: ring marble thick
object.description: A thick ring made of marble

object.name: bracelet thick marble
object.description: A thick bracelet made of marble lies here.

object.name: boots striding
object.description: A lithe pair of leather boots have been left here.

extra_description.description: They look comfortable to walk in.

object.name: cloak icy white
object.description: A cold pile of white cloth lies here.

extra_description.description: Smoke rises from it almost like it's made of dry ice.

object.name: staff ice
object.description: A staff made of ice rests here.

extra_description.description: The runes "FrIgID" are inscribed in the icy staff.

object.name: ring carved wooden
object.description: A wooden ring is on the floor.

object.name: horn life
object.description: A severed minotaur horn lies here.

extra_description.description: The horn is capped at both ends with gold. Unreadable runes are scrawled on it.

object.name: belt life
object.description: A strange belt lies here.

object.name: stone blood red
object.description: A blood red stone lies here collecting dust.

extra_description.description: The stone pulses with your own heart beat.

object.name: crossbow huge
object.description: A huge crossbow rests here.

object.name: pack leather small
object.description: A small leather pack rests here.

extra_description.description: It looks pretty big on the inside.

object.name: hood black leather
object.description: A hood made of black leather rests here.

object.name: sleeves black leather
object.short_descr: a pair of black leather sleeves
object.description: Some leather sleeves lie here.

object.name: pants black leather
object.short_descr: a pair of black leather pants
object.description: Some leather pants lie here.

extra_description.description: They look sneaky.

object.name: sword wicked short shortsword
object.description: A wicked looking shortsword lies here.

extra_description.description: It looks just perfect for backstabbing.

object.name: globe major
object.description: A large globe rests here, pulsing uneasily.

extra_description.description: Shimmering colors move inside the globe.

extra_description.description: The runes "DeAtH" are scrawled along the blade.

extra_description.description: You can almost see through it.

object.description: A shimmering helm rests here.

extra_description.description: You can almost see through it.
